description:
11.55 dblur
Apply Directional blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:

angle.description: Set angle of directional blur. Default is 45.

planes.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.

radius.description: Set radius of directional blur. Default is 5.

name: dblur

parameters.description: Set angle of directional blur. Default is 45.
parameters.name: angle

parameters.description: Set radius of directional blur. Default is 5.
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.55 dblur

Apply Directional blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:

angle

Set angle of directional blur. Default is 45.

radius

Set radius of directional blur. Default is 5.

planes

Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
